summary:
Conversion of the Nightshade Armor to the 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage.
Thanks to calyps for the permission and Crosscrusade - Sevennity's - DeMoNhUnTeR1986 for the 7B bodies.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img837.imageshack.us/img837/2593/5efe.png[/img][/center]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][color=Slategray] INTRODUCTION [/color][/size][/font][/b]
[size=3]This mod is a conversion of [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12070//?] Nightshade Armor [/url][/b] to the 7B Cleavage Body
The armor is now compatible with Dual Shelth Redux.
If you find any issue post them in the comments section.
It has very subtle BBP effect. Non BBP may come latter.

Friendly suggestion: Why not grab the beutiful [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27787//?] Nightshade - Retexture UNPB [/url][/b]. But don't forget to endorse [b][color=Lightsteelblue] NanaBeats [/color][/b]!
[b]The original armor and all its content are still required! Links below.[/b][/size]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][size=5][color=Slategray] REQUIRED [/color][/size][/font][/b]
[size=3][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12070//?] Nightshade Armor [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse!
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992//?] SeveNBase FemaleBody Replacer [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse!
[b][color=crimson]A BBP Skeleton is required or you get a CTD - So choose one [/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800//?] XP32[/url][/b] or  [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16712/?] Skulltyrant's [/url][/b] - don't forget to endorse![/size]

[b][font=Book Antiqua][color=Slategray][size=5pt] CREDITS [/size][/color][/font][/b]
[size=3]Special thanks to [b][color=Lightsteelblue] calyps [/color][/b] for making the [b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12070//?] Nightshade Armor [/url][/b]
Please also endorse calyps armors!

Much thanks to [b][color=Lightsteelblue] Crosscrusade - Sevennity's - DeMoNhUnTeR1986 [/color][/b] for the 7B body 
and variations!
Thanks a lot [b][color=Lightsteelblue] NanaBeats. [/color][/b] for the beautiful [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27787//?] Nightshade - Retexture UNPB [/url][/b]. Just when you think that this amazing armor couldn't get any better! 

[b][color=Lightsteelblue] XP32 [/color][/b] and [b][color=Lightsteelblue] Skulltyrant's [/color][/b] for the BBP and TBBP skeletons and a lot of compatibility between mods.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] Nightasy [/color][/b] for making all the tutorials on 3ds MAX.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] Shockero [/color][/b] for giving me some finishing tips on converting amors.
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] SkyrimTuner [/color][/b] for the [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30936/?] RealVision ENB [/url][/b]
[b][color=Lightsteelblue] missjennabee [/color][/b] for the amazing [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13608/?] Expanded Towns and Cities [/url][/b] - Screenshots in the mod were taken on Riverwood.[/size]

[b][color=Lightsteelblue][size=4] My other conversions [/size][/color][/b]
[b][size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42292//?] Assault Armor - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45334/?] Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45344/?] Misfit Mage - 7B-Sevenbase Cleavage BBP [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42292//?] Sexy Tsuns Armor Mashup - Sevenbase-7B Cleavage [/url][/b][/size]

[b]Original armor Credits/Thanks:[/b]

Thanks go to Witblitz, maker of the panty hose for UNP clothing, for helping me figure out skintight cloth.
author: bla08
